text: A Chinese dialogue about going to the park (公园).This conversation continues at a HSK 2 level.小明：小红，你星期六想去玩儿吗？还是你想在学校学习？小红：你想去哪里？小明：星期六我们去公园吧，夏天来了，我们可以去游泳。小红：好啊！小明：那星期六早上九点，我在学校门口等你。小明：Xiao Hong, do you want to hang out this Saturday? Or do you want to study at school?小红：Where do you want to go?小明：Let’s go to the park on Saturday; summer is here. We can go swim.小红：Ok!小明：Saturday morning nine o’clock. I’ll meet you by the school gate.1 – 小明想去哪里玩？a. 学校b. 公园c. 加拿大d. 商店2 – 他们什么时候去玩？a. 早上八点b. 晚上九点c. 早上六点d. 早上九点1. b2. dReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
